europe.subtitle: The ball is in our court.

mission.title: Your Mission
mission.description: For three days, take part in the creation of open-source apps aimed at strengthening European digital sovereignty.

avosmarques.title: GET SET.
avosmarques.description: Let’s unite our efforts around a clear topic: everyday collaborative tools. Text editing, spreadsheets, messaging, video conferencing, kanbans: all these playgrounds are available to you. Discover the first tracks:

1.title: Fixing collaboration
1.description: Enhance real-time collaboration with CRDTs, offline synchronization, and decentralized tools.

2.title: AI boosted
2.description: Inject AI into user journeys: smart search, agentic AI, automatic transcription... and any other relevant applications!

3.title: Click. Deploy. Make history.
3.description: Enhance the accessibility of products, and package applications for optimised deployments for everyone!

4.title: Blocks Unleashed
4.description: Integrate new blocks (spreadsheet, canvas, whiteboard… or your solution?), customise the features to enhance usage.

5.title: Boost & Scale
5.description: Build a marketplace for extensions, enhance user support, and offer strategies for the adoption and growth of an app ecosystem.

6.title: So, so many use cases
6.description: Health, Education, Research, Agriculture… Imagine new workflows tailored to your specific use cases.

7.title: Decipher me, if you can
7.description: Propose fully encrypted communication and collaboration for total sovereignty. E2EE, quantum-resistant encryption, Matrix protocol, PGP, zero-knowledge proof...

8.title: Bring your own track.
8.description: If none of the topics suit you, you can, of course, propose your own.

prets.title: READY?
prets.description: Familiarise yourself now with open-source applications Docs, Visio and Grist.

docs.description: The open-source document editor based on the Blocknote.js library.

visio.description: The next-generation video conferencing app, built on Livekit.

grist.description: The open-source collaborative spreadsheet for structuring your databases and creating applications without coding.

mystere.title: Mysterious app
mystere.description: Join the event to discover a unique open-source app!

partez.title: GO!
partez.description: 3 days to sprint towards digital sovereignty! During the three days, meal trays will be provided.

1.title: Development
1.description: Presentation of the tracks, team validation, start of development.

2.title: Development
2.description: A day fully dedicated to development.

3.title: Demonstrations and Conferences
3.description: Presentation of projects before a jury followed by conferences. The speakers will be announced here soon.

hn.title: Docs #1 on Hacker News
hn.description: Docs reached the top spot on Hacker News on 16th March.

reddit.title: Docs on Reddit
reddit.description: There’s also a discussion about Docs here!

techpost.title: Docs on Techspot
techpost.description: This US journal talks about Docs as a potential replacement for US-made solutions.

XDA.title: Docs on XDA
XDA.description: This leading Canadian journal endorses Docs!

HowTo.title: Docs on How-To Geek
HowTo.description: Docs is presented as a strong European alternative.

informations.title: LET’S MEET AT ENS
informations.description: The place is easy to reach by public transport: you can take the RER B, metro line 4, tram 3a, or buses 92, 68, and 38. It is recommended to book a hotel close to these lines.
